  font-family: var(--font-family-base);

}

body {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

*,

  box-sizing: inherit;
}

/* Typography */
h1,

h3,
h4,

h6 {
  margin: 0;
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);

}

  font-size: var(--font-size-4xl);

}

  font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
}
h6 {
  font-size: var(--font-size-md);
}

p {
  margin: 0 0 var(--space-16) 0;
}

a {
  color: var(--color-primary);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-standard);
}

a:hover {
  color: var(--color-primary-hover);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-16);
  border-radius: var(--radius-base);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  font-weight: 500;
  line-height: 1.5;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-standard);
  border: none;
  text-decoration: none;
  position: relative;
}

.btn:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: var(--focus-ring);
}

.btn--primary {
  background: var(--color-primary);
  color: var(--color-btn-primary-text);
}

.btn--primary:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-hover);
}

.btn--primary:active {
  background: var(--color-primary-active);
}

.btn--secondary {
  background: var(--color-secondary);
  color: var(--color-text);
}

.btn--secondary:hover {
  background: var(--color-secondary-hover);
}

.btn--secondary:active {
  background: var(--color-secondary-active);
}

.btn--outline {
  background: transparent;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  color: var(--color-text);
}

.btn--outline:hover {
  background: var(--color-secondary);
}

.btn--sm {
  padding: var(--space-4) var(--space-12);
  font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
}

.btn--lg {
  padding: var(--space-10) var(--space-20);
  font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
}

.btn--full-width {
  width: 100%;
}

.btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

/* Form elements */
.form-control {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12);
  font-size: var(--font-size-md);
  line-height: 1.5;
  color: var(--color-text);
  background-color: var(--color-surface);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-base);
  transition: border-color var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-standard),
    box-shadow var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-standard);
}

textarea.form-control {
  font-family: var(--font-family-base);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  resize: vertical;
  min-height: 80px;
}

select.form-control {
  padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12);
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  -moz-appearance: none;
  appearance: none;
  background-image: var(--select-caret-light);
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: right var(--space-12) center;
  background-size: 16px;
  padding-right: var(--space-32);
}

.form-control:focus {
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  outline: var(--focus-outline);
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
  font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
}

/* Card component */
.card {
  background-color: var(--color-surface);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-card-border);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: box-shadow var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-standard);
}

.card:hover {
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
}

.card__body {
  padding: var(--space-16);
}

.card__header,
.card__footer {
  padding: var(--space-16);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-card-border-inner);
}

/* Container layout */
.container {
  width: 100%;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  padding-right: var(--space-16);
  padding-left: var(--space-16);
}

@media (min-width: 640px) {
  .container {
    max-width: var(--container-sm);
  }
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .container {
    max-width: var(--container-md);
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .container {
    max-width: var(--container-lg);
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1280px) {
  .container {
    max-width: var(--container-xl);
  }
}

/* Utility classes */
.flex {
  display: flex;
}
.flex-col {
  flex-direction: column;
}
.items-center {
  align-items: center;
}
.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}
.justify-between {
  justify-content: space-between;
}
.gap-4 {
  gap: var(--space-4);
}
.gap-8 {
  gap: var(--space-8);
}
.gap-16 {
  gap: var(--space-16);
}

.m-0 {
  margin: 0;
}
.mt-8 {
  margin-top: var(--space-8);
}
.mb-8 {
  margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
}
.mx-8 {
  margin-left: var(--space-8);
  margin-right: var(--space-8);
}
.my-8 {
  margin-top: var(--space-8);
  margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
}

.p-0 {
  padding: 0;
}
.py-8 {
  padding-top: var(--space-8);
  padding-bottom: var(--space-8);
}
.px-8 {
  padding-left: var(--space-8);
  padding-right: var(--space-8);
}
.py-16 {
  padding-top: var(--space-16);
  padding-bottom: var(--space-16);
}
.px-16 {
  padding-left: var(--space-16);
  padding-right: var(--space-16);
}

.block {
  display: block;
}
.hidden {
  display: none;
}

/* Accessibility */
.sr-only {
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  padding: 0;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
  white-space: nowrap;
  border-width: 0;
}

:focus-visible {
  outline: var(--focus-outline);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'FKGroteskNeue';
  src: url('https://r2cdn.perplexity.ai/fonts/FKGroteskNeue.woff2')
    format('woff2');
}

/* Custom App Styles */
.app-container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: var(--space-16);
}

.app-header {
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: var(--space-32);
}

.navigation {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-24);
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.week-selector {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-24);
    justify-content: center;
}

.sync-status {
    padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12);
    border-radius: var(--radius-base);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
    font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
}

.sync-status.success {
    background: rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-success);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.2);
}

.sync-status.error {
    background: rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-error);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.2);
}

.sync-status.loading {
    background: rgba(var(--color-info-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-info);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-info-rgb), 0.2);
}

.diary-content {
    display: grid;
    gap: var(--space-24);
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
    .diary-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    }
}

.goal-section, .daily-entries-section {
    background: var(--color-surface);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-card-border);
    padding: var(--space-20);
}

.daily-entry {
    background: var(--color-bg-1);
    border-radius: var(--radius-base);
    padding: var(--space-16);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-card-border-inner);
}

.daily-entry h4 {
    color: var(--color-primary);

}

.evaluation-grid {
    display: grid;

}

.evaluation-item {

}

.evaluation-item label {

.eval-btn {

}

.eval-btn:hover {

}

.eval-btn.success {

}

.eval-btn.error {

}

.reflection-field {

.actions {

    justify-content: center;
}

.preview-table {

.preview-table th,

.status-message.success {

}

.status-message.error {

.preview-section {

    left: 0;

    height: 100%;

    align-items: center;

.loading-content {

}

.loading-spinner {

    margin: 0 auto var(--space-16) auto;

@keyframes spin {

    100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {

    }
}

            getCurrentWeek() {
                const now = new Date();
                const year = now.getFullYear();
                const firstDayOfYear = new Date(year, 0, 1);
                const pastDaysOfYear = (now - firstDayOfYear) / 86400000;
                const weekNumber = Math.ceil((pastDaysOfYear + firstDayOfYear.getDay() + 1) / 7);
                return `${year}-W${String(weekNumber).padStart(2, '0')}`;
            }
            
            initializeWeekData() {
                if (!this.weekData) {

                    };
                }

            generateDailyRecords() {
                const records = [];
                const [year, week] = this.currentWeek.split('-W');
                const startDate = this.getDateOfWeek(parseInt(year), parseInt(week));
                
                const dayNames = ['æœˆ', 'ç«', 'æ°´', 'æœ¨', 'é‡‘', 'åœŸ', 'æ—¥'];
                
                for (let i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
                    const date = new Date(startDate);
                    date.setDate(date.getDate() + i);
                    
                    const responses = {};
                    this.evaluationItems.forEach(item => {
                        responses[item] = '';
                    });
                    
                    records.push({
                        date: date.toISOString().split('T')[0],
                        dayOfWeek: dayNames[i],
                        responses: responses,
                        reflection: ''
                    });
                }
                
                return records;
            }
            
            getDateOfWeek(year, week) {
                const firstDayOfYear = new Date(year, 0, 1);
                const days = (week - 1) * 7;
                const mondayOfWeek = new Date(firstDayOfYear);
                mondayOfWeek.setDate(firstDayOfYear.getDate() + days - firstDayOfYear.getDay() + 1);
                return mondayOfWeek;
            }

                let newWeek = parseInt(week) + direction;
                let newYear = parseInt(year);
                
                if (newWeek < 1) {
                    newWeek = 52;
                    newYear--;

.btn {
  display: inline-flex;

  line-height: 1.5;

  transition: all var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-standard);
  border: none;

}

.btn:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: var(--focus-ring);
}

.btn--primary {
  background: var(--color-primary);
  color: var(--color-btn-primary-text);
}

.btn--primary:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-hover);
}

}

.btn--secondary {

}

}

}

.btn--outline {
  background: transparent;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  color: var(--color-text);
}

.btn--outline:hover {

}

.btn--sm {

  font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
}

.btn--lg {
  padding: var(--space-10) var(--space-20);
  font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
}

.btn--full-width {
  width: 100%;
}

.btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

/* Form elements */
.form-control {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12);
  font-size: var(--font-size-md);
  line-height: 1.5;
  color: var(--color-text);
  background-color: var(--color-surface);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-base);
  transition: border-color var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-standard),
    box-shadow var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-standard);
}

textarea.form-control {
  font-family: var(--font-family-base);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  resize: vertical;
  min-height: 80px;
}

select.form-control {
  padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12);
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  -moz-appearance: none;
  appearance: none;
  background-image: var(--select-caret-light);
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: right var(--space-12) center;
  background-size: 16px;
  padding-right: var(--space-32);
}

.form-control:focus {
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  outline: var(--focus-outline);
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
  font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.form-group {

}

}

}

.card__body {

.sr-only {

@font-face {

  src: url('https://r2cdn.perplexity.ai/fonts/FKGroteskNeue.woff2')
    format('woff2');
}

/* Custom App Styles */
.app-container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: var(--space-16);
}

.app-header {
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: var(--space-32);
}

.navigation {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-24);
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.week-selector {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-24);
    justify-content: center;
}

.sync-status {
    padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12);
    border-radius: var(--radius-base);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
    font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
}

.sync-status.success {
    background: rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-success);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.2);
}

.sync-status.error {
    background: rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-error);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.2);
}

.sync-status.loading {
    background: rgba(var(--color-info-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-info);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-info-rgb), 0.2);
}

.diary-content {
    display: grid;
    gap: var(--space-24);
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
    .diary-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    }
}

.goal-section, .daily-entries-section {
    background: var(--color-surface);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-card-border);
    padding: var(--space-20);
}

    border-radius: var(--radius-base);
    padding: var(--space-16);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-card-border-inner);
}

.daily-entry h4 {
    color: var(--color-primary);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-12);
}

.evaluation-grid {
    display: grid;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-12);
}

.evaluation-item {

    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;

    background: var(--color-surface);
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}

.evaluation-item label {
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
    font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
    flex: 1;
    margin: 0;
}

.evaluation-buttons {
    display: flex;
    gap: var(--space-4);
}

.eval-btn {
    width: 32px;
    height: 32px;
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
    background: var(--color-surface);
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-standard);
}

.eval-btn:hover {
    background: var(--color-secondary);
}

.eval-btn.active {
    background: var(--color-primary);
    color: var(--color-btn-primary-text);
    border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.eval-btn.success {
    background: rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-success);
    border-color: var(--color-success);
}

.eval-btn.error {
    background: rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-error);
    border-color: var(--color-error);
}

.eval-btn.warning {
    background: rgba(var(--color-warning-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-warning);
    border-color: var(--color-warning);
}

.reflection-field {
    margin-top: var(--space-12);
}

.reflection-field textarea {
    min-height: 100px;
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.actions {
    display: flex;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-top: var(--space-24);
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
}

.preview-table {
    width: 100%;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    margin-top: var(--space-16);
    background: var(--color-surface);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
    table-layout: auto;
}

.preview-table th,
.preview-table td {
    padding: var(--space-8);
    text-align: left;
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-card-border-inner);
    vertical-align: top;
}

.preview-table th {
    background: var(--color-bg-2);
    font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
    color: var(--color-text);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.preview-table .date-cell {
    min-width: 80px;
    width: 80px;
    font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
    color: var(--color-primary);
}

.preview-table .eval-cell {
    min-width: 60px;
    width: 60px;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
}

.preview-table .reflection-cell {
    min-width: 200px;
    max-width: 400px;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    white-space: pre-wrap;
    padding: var(--space-8);
    line-height: var(--line-height-normal);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.export-mode .preview-table {
    width: auto;
    table-layout: auto;
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.export-mode .preview-table .reflection-cell {
    max-width: 350px;
}

.settings-modal {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.settings-content {
    background: var(--color-surface);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);

}

.settings-header {

    align-items: center;
    margin-bottom: var(--space-20);

    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-card-border-inner);
}

.close-btn {
    background: none;
    border: none;
    font-size: var(--font-size-xl);

    color: var(--color-text-secondary);
    padding: var(--space-4);
}

.close-btn:hover {
    color: var(--color-text);
}

.items-manager {
    background: var(--color-bg-3);
    border-radius: var(--radius-base);

    margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
}

.item-list {
    max-height: 200px;
    overflow-y: auto;
    border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
    background: var(--color-surface);
}

.item-row {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: var(--space-8);
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-card-border-inner);
}

.item-row:last-child {

}

.item-text {
    flex: 1;

}

.delete-item-btn {
    background: none;
    border: none;
    color: var(--color-error);

    padding: var(--space-2);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.delete-item-btn:hover {
    background: rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.1);
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
}

.add-item-form {
    display: flex;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-top: var(--space-12);
}

.github-sync {
    background: var(--color-bg-1);
    border-radius: var(--radius-base);
    padding: var(--space-16);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
}

.github-sync .form-group {
    margin-bottom: var(--space-12);
}

.status-message {
    padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12);
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-12);
}

.status-message.success {
    background: rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-success);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.2);
}

.status-message.error {
    background: rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-error);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.2);
}

.preview-section {
    margin-top: var(--space-24);
    padding: var(--space-20);
    background: var(--color-surface);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-card-border);
}

.loading-overlay {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    z-index: 2000;
}

.loading-content {
    background: var(--color-surface);
    padding: var(--space-24);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

.loading-spinner {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    border: 4px solid var(--color-border);
    border-top: 4px solid var(--color-primary);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
    margin: 0 auto var(--space-16) auto;
}

@keyframes spin {
    0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
    100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .diary-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
    
    .navigation {
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
    }
    
    .actions {
        flex-direction: column;
    }
    
    .preview-table {
        font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
    }
    
    .preview-table .reflection-cell {
        max-width: 250px;
    }
}

@media print {
    .navigation,
    .actions,
    .app-header .btn {
        display: none !important;
    }
    
    .preview-table {
        box-shadow: none;
        border: 1px solid #000;
    }
    
    .preview-table th,
    .preview-table td {
        border: 1px solid #000;
    }
}

    <script>
        class DiaryApp {
            constructor() {
                this.currentWeek = this.getCurrentWeek();
                this.currentView = 'diary';
                this.weekData = null;
                this.syncSettings = {
                    githubToken: '',
                    repoOwner: '',
                    repoName: ''
                };
                
                // ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆé …ç›®ã‚’å®šç¾©
                this.defaultItems = [
                    "ä»Šé€±ã®ç›®æ¨™",
                    "ãƒã‚¤ãƒ‹ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "è‡ªåˆ†ã®æ™‚é–“ã‚’ã§ãã‚‹ã ã‘ä½¿ã‚ãªã„ã€‚",
                    "äººã®ã“ã¨ã‚’æ‚ªãæ€ã‚ãªã„ã€‚",
                    "ãµã¨ã—ãŸç¬é–“ã®å¿ƒã§äººã«ä¸è¶³ã›ãšã€æ„Ÿè¬ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "æ¯æ—¥è¦ªãŒå–œã‚“ã§ãã ã•ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç ”ç©¶ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "å®Ÿè¡Œã™ã‚‹ã¨ãã¯å¿ƒã‹ã‚‰ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "æœèµ·ããŸæ™‚ã«ã¾ãšã€è¦ªã¸ã®æ„Ÿè¬ã‹ã‚‰ã€‚",
                    "äººã«è¿·æƒ‘ã‚’ã‹ã‘ãªã„ã€‚",
                    "ã˜ã£ã¨ã—ã¨ã‚‰ã‚“ã€è¦ªã®æ€ã„ã«ã¯ã¾ã‚ŠãŸã„ã€ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã„ã¨æ€ã£ã¦æ—¥ã€…ã‚’é€šã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "å› ç¸è‡ªè¦šã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "æ¯æ—¥å‹‰å¼·ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "å­—ã‚’ç¶ºéº—ã«æ›¸ãã€‚",
                    "èº«ã ã—ãªã¿ã‚’æ•´ãˆã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "ä½“å¹¹ã€ç­‹ãƒˆãƒ¬ã€æŸ”è»Ÿã€ãƒãƒ¬ã‚¨",
                    "ã‚„ã‚‹ã¹ãã“ã¨ã‚’çµ‚ã‚ã‚‰ã›ã¦ã‹ã‚‰å¯ã‚‹ã€‚"
                ];
                
                this.evaluationItems = [...this.defaultItems.slice(1)]; // "ä»Šé€±ã®ç›®æ¨™"ã‚’é™¤ã
                
                this.checkOptions = [
                    { value: 'â­•ï¸', label: 'â­•ï¸', color: '#22c55e', class: 'success' },
                    { value: 'âœ–ï¸', label: 'âœ–ï¸', color: '#ef4444', class: 'error' },
                    { value: 'â–³', label: 'â–³', color: '#f59e0b', class: 'warning' }
                ];
                
                this.init();
            }
            
            init() {
                this.updateWeekDisplay();
                this.initializeWeekData();
                this.renderDiary();
                this.loadData(); // ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªèµ·å‹•æ™‚ã«åŒæœŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’è‡ªå‹•èª­è¾¼
                this.hideLoading();
                this.loadSettings();
            }
            
            getCurrentWeek() {
                const now = new Date();
                const year = now.getFullYear();
                const firstDayOfYear = new Date(year, 0, 1);
                const pastDaysOfYear = (now - firstDayOfYear) / 86400000;
                const weekNumber = Math.ceil((pastDaysOfYear + firstDayOfYear.getDay() + 1) / 7);
                return `${year}-W${String(weekNumber).padStart(2, '0')}`;
            }
            
            initializeWeekData() {
                if (!this.weekData) {
                    this.weekData = {
                        week: this.currentWeek,
                        goal: '',
                        dailyRecords: this.generateDailyRecords()
                    };
                }
            }
            
            generateDailyRecords() {
                const records = [];
                const [year, week] = this.currentWeek.split('-W');
                const startDate = this.getDateOfWeek(parseInt(year), parseInt(week));
                
                const dayNames = ['æœˆ', 'ç«', 'æ°´', 'æœ¨', 'é‡‘', 'åœŸ', 'æ—¥'];
                
                for (let i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
                    const date = new Date(startDate);
                    date.setDate(date.getDate() + i);
                    
                    const responses = {};
                    this.evaluationItems.forEach(item => {
                        responses[item] = '';
                    });
                    
                    records.push({
                        date: date.toISOString().split('T')[0],
                        dayOfWeek: dayNames[i],
                        responses: responses,
                        reflection: ''
                    });
                }
                
                return records;
            }
            
            getDateOfWeek(year, week) {
                const firstDayOfYear = new Date(year, 0, 1);
                const days = (week - 1) * 7;
                const mondayOfWeek = new Date(firstDayOfYear);
                mondayOfWeek.setDate(firstDayOfYear.getDate() + days - firstDayOfYear.getDay() + 1);
                return mondayOfWeek;
            }
            
            updateWeekDisplay() {
                document.getElementById('currentWeek').textContent = this.currentWeek;
            }
            
            changeWeek(direction) {
                const [year, week] = this.currentWeek.split('-W');
                let newWeek = parseInt(week) + direction;
                let newYear = parseInt(year);
                
                if (newWeek < 1) {
                    newWeek = 52;
                    newYear--;
                } else if (newWeek > 52) {
                    newWeek = 1;
                    newYear++;
                }
                
                this.currentWeek = `${newYear}-W${String(newWeek).padStart(2, '0')}`;
                this.updateWeekDisplay();
                this.initializeWeekData();
                this.renderDiary();
                this.loadData(); // é€±å¤‰æ›´æ™‚ã«ã‚‚ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿èª­è¾¼
            }
            
            showDiary() {
                this.currentView = 'diary';
                document.getElementById('diaryView').classList.remove('hidden');
                document.getElementById('previewView').classList.add('hidden');
                this.renderDiary();
            }
            
            showPreview() {
                this.currentView = 'preview';
                document.getElementById('diaryView').classList.add('hidden');
                document.getElementById('previewView').classList.remove('hidden');
                this.renderPreview();
            }
            
            showSettings() {
                document.getElementById('settingsModal').classList.remove('hidden');
                this.renderSettings();
            }
            
            hideSettings() {
                document.getElementById('settingsModal').classList.add('hidden');
            }
            
            renderDiary() {
                const weekGoal = document.getElementById('weekGoal');
                weekGoal.value = this.weekData.goal;
                
                weekGoal.addEventListener('input', () => {
                    this.weekData.goal = weekGoal.value;
                });
                
                const container = document.getElementById('dailyEntries');
                container.innerHTML = '';
                
                this.weekData.dailyRecords.forEach((record, dayIndex) => {
                    const dayEntry = document.createElement('div');
                    dayEntry.className = 'daily-entry';
                    
                    const date = new Date(record.date);
                    const formattedDate = `${date.getMonth() + 1}/${date.getDate()}`;
                    
                    dayEntry.innerHTML = `
                        <h4>${formattedDate} (${record.dayOfWeek})</h4>
                        <div class="evaluation-grid">
                            ${this.evaluationItems.map(item => `
                                <div class="evaluation-item">
                                    <label>${item}</label>
                                    <div class="evaluation-buttons">
                                        ${this.checkOptions.map(option => `
                                            <button type="button" 
                                                    class="eval-btn ${option.class} ${record.responses[item] === option.value ? 'active' : ''}" 
                                                    onclick="diaryApp.setEvaluation(${dayIndex}, '${item}', '${option.value}')">
                                                ${option.value}
                                            </button>
                                        `).join('')}
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            `).join('')}
                        </div>
                        <div class="reflection-field">
                            <label class="form-label">æ„Ÿæƒ³ãƒ»æ°—ã¥ã</label>
                            <textarea class="form-control" rows="3" 
                                placeholder="ä»Šæ—¥ã®æ„Ÿæƒ³ã‚„æ°—ã¥ãã‚’è¨˜éŒ²ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„"
                                onchange="diaryApp.setReflection(${dayIndex}, this.value)">${record.reflection}</textarea>
                        </div>
                    `;
                    
                    container.appendChild(dayEntry);
                });
            }
            
            setEvaluation(dayIndex, item, value) {
                // åŒã˜å€¤ã®å ´åˆã¯ç©ºã«ã™ã‚‹ï¼ˆãƒˆã‚°ãƒ«æ©Ÿèƒ½ï¼‰
                if (this.weekData.dailyRecords[dayIndex].responses[item] === value) {
                    this.weekData.dailyRecords[dayIndex].responses[item] = '';
                } else {
                    this.weekData.dailyRecords[dayIndex].responses[item] = value;
                }
                this.renderDiary();
            }
            
            setReflection(dayIndex, value) {
                this.weekData.dailyRecords[dayIndex].reflection = value;
            }
            
            renderPreview() {
                const container = document.getElementById('previewContent');
                
                let html = `
                    <div class="preview-header">
                        <h4>é€±é–“ç›®æ¨™: ${this.weekData.goal || 'æœªè¨­å®š'}</h4>
                        <p>æœŸé–“: ${this.currentWeek}</p>
                    </div>
                    
                    <table class="preview-table">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <th class="date-cell">æ—¥ä»˜</th>
                                ${this.evaluationItems.map(item => `<th class="eval-cell">${item.length > 10 ? item.substring(0, 10) + '...' : item}</th>`).join('')}
                                <th class="reflection-cell">æ„Ÿæƒ³ãƒ»æ°—ã¥ã</th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tbody>
                            ${this.weekData.dailyRecords.map(record => {
                                const date = new Date(record.date);
                                const formattedDate = `${date.getMonth() + 1}/${date.getDate()}`;
                                
                                return `
                                    <tr>
                                        <td class="date-cell">${formattedDate}(${record.dayOfWeek})</td>
                                        ${this.evaluationItems.map(item => `
                                            <td class="eval-cell">${record.responses[item] || ''}</td>
                                        `).join('')}
                                        <td class="reflection-cell">${record.reflection || ''}</td>
                                    </tr>
                                `;
                            }).join('')}
                        </tbody>

            renderSettings() {

                const itemsList = document.getElementById('itemsList');

                this.evaluationItems.forEach((item, index) => {

                    `;
                    itemsList.appendChild(itemRow);
                });
                
                // GitHubè¨­å®šã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
                document.getElementById('githubToken').value = this.syncSettings.githubToken;
                document.getElementById('repoOwner').value = this.syncSettings.repoOwner;
                document.getElementById('repoName').value = this.syncSettings.repoName;
            }
            
            addItem() {
                const input = document.getElementById('newItemInput');
                const newItem = input.value.trim();
                
                if (newItem && !this.evaluationItems.includes(newItem)) {
                    this.evaluationItems.push(newItem);
                    input.value = '';
                    this.renderSettings();
                    this.initializeWeekData();
                    this.renderDiary();
                }
            }
            
            removeItem(index) {
                this.evaluationItems.splice(index, 1);
                this.renderSettings();
                this.initializeWeekData();
                this.renderDiary();
            }
            
            resetToDefaults() {
                if (confirm('ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆè¨­å®šã«æˆ»ã—ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿç¾åœ¨ã®é …ç›®ã¯ã™ã¹ã¦å‰Šé™¤ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚')) {
                    this.evaluationItems = [...this.defaultItems.slice(1)];
                    this.renderSettings();
                    this.initializeWeekData();
                    this.renderDiary();
                }
            }
            
            saveSettings() {
                // GitHubè¨­å®šã‚’ä¿å­˜
                this.syncSettings.githubToken = document.getElementById('githubToken').value;
                this.syncSettings.repoOwner = document.getElementById('repoOwner').value;
                this.syncSettings.repoName = document.getElementById('repoName').value;
                
                this.showStatusMessage('è¨­å®šãŒä¿å­˜ã•ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸ', 'success');
                this.hideSettings();
            }
            
            loadSettings() {
                // å®Ÿéš›ã®ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã§ã¯localStorageã®ä»£ã‚ã‚Šã«ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªå¤‰æ•°ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨
                // ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ç’°å¢ƒã§ã®localStorageåˆ¶é™ã®ãŸã‚
            }
            
            async testConnection() {
                const statusDiv = document.getElementById('connectionStatus');
                statusDiv.innerHTML = '<div class="status-message loading">æ¥ç¶šãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆä¸­...</div>';
                
                try {
                    const token = document.getElementById('githubToken').value;
                    const owner = document.getElementById('repoOwner').value;
                    const repo = document.getElementById('repoName').value;
                    
                    if (!token || !owner || !repo) {
                        throw new Error('ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„');
                    }
                    
                    const response = await fetch(`https://api.github.com/repos/${owner}/${repo}`, {
                        headers: {
                            'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                            'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json'
                        }
                    });
                    
                    if (response.ok) {
                        statusDiv.innerHTML = '<div class="status-message success">âœ… æ¥ç¶šæˆåŠŸ</div>';
                    } else {
                        throw new Error(`æ¥ç¶šã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: ${response.status}`);
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    statusDiv.innerHTML = `<div class="status-message error">âŒ ${error.message}</div>`;
                }
            }
            
            async saveData() {
                this.showLoading();
                
                try {
                    const success = await this.saveToGitHub(this.weekData);
                    if (success) {
                        this.showSyncStatus('âœ… ä¿å­˜å®Œäº†', 'success');
                    } else {
                        this.showSyncStatus('âŒ ä¿å­˜å¤±æ•—', 'error');
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Save error:', error);
                    this.showSyncStatus('âŒ ä¿å­˜ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼', 'error');
                } finally {
                    this.hideLoading();
                }
            }
            
            async loadData() {
                this.showSyncStatus('ğŸ”„ åŒæœŸä¸­...', 'loading');
                
                try {
                    const data = await this.loadWeekData(this.currentWeek);
                    if (data) {
                        this.weekData = data;
                        this.renderDiary();
                        this.showSyncStatus('âœ… åŒæœŸå®Œäº†', 'success');
                    } else {
                        this.showSyncStatus('â„¹ï¸ æ–°è¦é€±', 'loading');
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Load error:', error);
                    this.showSyncStatus('âŒ åŒæœŸã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼', 'error');
                }
            }
            
            async saveToGitHub(weekData) {
                const token = this.syncSettings.githubToken;
                if (!token) {
                    console.log('GitHub token not configured');
                    return false;
                }
                
                try {
                    const response = await fetch(
                        `https://api.github.com/repos/${this.syncSettings.repoOwner}/${this.syncSettings.repoName}/dispatches`,
                        {
                            method: 'POST',
                            headers: {
                                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                                'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json',
                                'X-GitHub-Api-Version': '2022-11-28'
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify({
                                event_type: 'save-diary',
                                client_payload: {
                                    week: weekData.week,
                                    data: JSON.stringify(weekData)

                    );
                    return response.ok;
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('GitHub API error:', error);
                    return false;
                }
            }
            
            async loadWeekData(week) {
                try {
                    // å®Ÿéš›ã®å®Ÿè£…ã§ã¯ã€GitHub APIã‚„å°‚ç”¨ã‚¨ãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆã‹ã‚‰ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’å–å¾—
                    // ã“ã“ã§ã¯ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã¨ã—ã¦ã€fetch APIã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸä¾‹ã‚’ç¤ºã™
                    const response = await fetch(`./data/weeks/${week}.json`);
                    if (response.ok) {
                        return await response.json();
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    console.log('No saved data found for week:', week);
                }
                return null;
            }
            
            async exportAsImage() {
                this.showLoading();
                
                try {
                    // ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆ
                    this.showPreview();
                    
                    // å°‘ã—å¾…ã£ã¦ã‹ã‚‰ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ—ãƒãƒ£ï¼ˆãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°å®Œäº†ã‚’å¾…ã¤ï¼‰
                    await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 100));
                    
                    const element = document.getElementById('previewContent');
                    element.classList.add('export-mode');
                    
                    const options = {
                        scale: 3,                    // é«˜è§£åƒåº¦
                        useCORS: true,
                        allowTaint: true,
                        backgroundColor: '#ffffff',
                        width: element.scrollWidth,
                        height: element.scrollHeight,
                        windowWidth: element.scrollWidth,
                        windowHeight: element.scrollHeight,
                        scrollX: 0,
                        scrollY: 0,
                        imageTimeout: 60000
                    };
                    
                    const canvas = await html2canvas(element, options);
                    
                    // ç”»åƒã‚’ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰
                    const link = document.createElement('a');
                    link.download = `diary-${this.currentWeek}.png`;
                    link.href = canvas.toDataURL('image/png');
                    link.click();
                    
                    element.classList.remove('export-mode');
                    this.showStatusMessage('ç”»åƒãŒãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã•ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸ', 'success');
                    
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Export error:', error);
                    this.showStatusMessage('ç”»åƒå‡ºåŠ›ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: ' + error.message, 'error');
                } finally {
                    this.hideLoading();
                }
            }
            
            showLoading() {
                document.getElementById('loadingOverlay').classList.remove('hidden');
            }
            
            hideLoading() {
                document.getElementById('loadingOverlay').classList.add('hidden');
            }
            
            showSyncStatus(message, type) {
                const statusElement = document.getElementById('syncStatus');
                statusElement.textContent = message;
                statusElement.className = `sync-status ${type}`;
                
                // 3ç§’å¾Œã«æ¶ˆå»ï¼ˆsuccessã¨errorã®å ´åˆï¼‰
                if (type !== 'loading') {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        statusElement.textContent = '';
                        statusElement.className = 'sync-status';
                    }, 3000);
                }
            }
            
            showStatusMessage(message, type) {
                // ä¸€æ™‚çš„ãªãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸è¡¨ç¤ºï¼ˆToasté¢¨ï¼‰
                const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');
                messageDiv.className = `status-message ${type}`;
                messageDiv.textContent = message;
                messageDiv.style.position = 'fixed';
                messageDiv.style.top = '20px';

                messageDiv.style.minWidth = '250px';
                
                document.body.appendChild(messageDiv);
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    document.body.removeChild(messageDiv);

            }
        }
        
        // ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³åˆæœŸåŒ–

*::before,
*::after {
  box-sizing: inherit;
}

/* Typography */
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6 {
  margin: 0;
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
  line-height: var(--line-height-tight);
  color: var(--color-text);
  letter-spacing: var(--letter-spacing-tight);
}

h1 {
  font-size: var(--font-size-4xl);
}
h2 {
  font-size: var(--font-size-3xl);
}
h3 {
  font-size: var(--font-size-2xl);
}
h4 {
  font-size: var(--font-size-xl);
}
h5 {
  font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
}
h6 {
  font-size: var(--font-size-md);
}

p {
  margin: 0 0 var(--space-16) 0;
}

a {
  color: var(--color-primary);
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-standard);
}

a:hover {
  color: var(--color-primary-hover);
}

/* Buttons */
.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-16);
  border-radius: var(--radius-base);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  font-weight: 500;
  line-height: 1.5;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-standard);
  border: none;
  text-decoration: none;
  position: relative;
}

.btn:focus-visible {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: var(--focus-ring);
}

.btn--primary {
  background: var(--color-primary);
  color: var(--color-btn-primary-text);
}

.btn--primary:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-hover);
}

.btn--primary:active {
  background: var(--color-primary-active);
}

.btn--secondary {
  background: var(--color-secondary);
  color: var(--color-text);
}

.btn--secondary:hover {
  background: var(--color-secondary-hover);
}

.btn--secondary:active {
  background: var(--color-secondary-active);
}

.btn--outline {
  background: transparent;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  color: var(--color-text);
}

.btn--outline:hover {
  background: var(--color-secondary);
}

.btn--sm {
  padding: var(--space-4) var(--space-12);
  font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
}

.btn--lg {
  padding: var(--space-10) var(--space-20);
  font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
}

.btn--full-width {
  width: 100%;
}

.btn:disabled {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
}

/* Form elements */
.form-control {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12);
  font-size: var(--font-size-md);
  line-height: 1.5;
  color: var(--color-text);
  background-color: var(--color-surface);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-base);
  transition: border-color var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-standard),
    box-shadow var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-standard);
}

textarea.form-control {
  font-family: var(--font-family-base);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  resize: vertical;
  min-height: 80px;
}

select.form-control {
  padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12);
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  -moz-appearance: none;
  appearance: none;
  background-image: var(--select-caret-light);
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: right var(--space-12) center;
  background-size: 16px;
  padding-right: var(--space-32);
}

.form-control:focus {
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  outline: var(--focus-outline);
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
  font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.form-group {
  margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
}

/* Card component */
.card {
  background-color: var(--color-surface);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-card-border);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: box-shadow var(--duration-normal) var(--ease-standard);
}

.card:hover {
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
}

.card__body {
  padding: var(--space-16);
}

.card__header,
.card__footer {
  padding: var(--space-16);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-card-border-inner);
}

/* Container layout */
.container {
  width: 100%;
  margin-right: auto;
  margin-left: auto;
  padding-right: var(--space-16);
  padding-left: var(--space-16);
}

@media (min-width: 640px) {
  .container {
    max-width: var(--container-sm);
  }
}
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .container {
    max-width: var(--container-md);
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .container {
    max-width: var(--container-lg);
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1280px) {
  .container {
    max-width: var(--container-xl);
  }
}

/* Utility classes */
.flex {
  display: flex;
}
.flex-col {
  flex-direction: column;
}
.items-center {
  align-items: center;
}
.justify-center {
  justify-content: center;
}
.justify-between {
  justify-content: space-between;
}
.gap-4 {
  gap: var(--space-4);
}
.gap-8 {
  gap: var(--space-8);
}
.gap-16 {
  gap: var(--space-16);
}

.m-0 {
  margin: 0;
}
.mt-8 {
  margin-top: var(--space-8);
}
.mb-8 {
  margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
}
.mx-8 {
  margin-left: var(--space-8);
  margin-right: var(--space-8);
}
.my-8 {
  margin-top: var(--space-8);
  margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
}

.p-0 {
  padding: 0;
}
.py-8 {
  padding-top: var(--space-8);
  padding-bottom: var(--space-8);
}
.px-8 {
  padding-left: var(--space-8);
  padding-right: var(--space-8);
}
.py-16 {
  padding-top: var(--space-16);
  padding-bottom: var(--space-16);
}
.px-16 {
  padding-left: var(--space-16);
  padding-right: var(--space-16);
}

.block {
  display: block;
}
.hidden {
  display: none !important;
}

/* Accessibility */
.sr-only {
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
  height: 1px;
  padding: 0;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
  white-space: nowrap;
  border-width: 0;
}

:focus-visible {
  outline: var(--focus-outline);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'FKGroteskNeue';
  src: url('https://r2cdn.perplexity.ai/fonts/FKGroteskNeue.woff2')
    format('woff2');
}

/* Custom App Styles */
.app-container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: var(--space-16);
}

.app-header {
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: var(--space-32);
}

.navigation {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-24);
    flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.week-selector {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-24);
    justify-content: center;
}

.sync-status {
    padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12);
    border-radius: var(--radius-base);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
    font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
}

.sync-status.success {
    background: rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-success);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.2);
}

.sync-status.error {
    background: rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-error);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.2);
}

.sync-status.loading {
    background: rgba(var(--color-info-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-info);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-info-rgb), 0.2);
}

.diary-content {
    display: grid;
    gap: var(--space-24);
}

@media (min-width: 768px) {
    .diary-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    }
}

.goal-section, .daily-entries-section {
    background: var(--color-surface);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-card-border);
    padding: var(--space-20);
}

.daily-entry {
    background: var(--color-bg-1);
    border-radius: var(--radius-base);
    padding: var(--space-16);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-card-border-inner);
}

.daily-entry h4 {
    color: var(--color-primary);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-12);
}

.evaluation-grid {
    display: grid;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-12);
}

.evaluation-item {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: var(--space-6);
    background: var(--color-surface);
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}

.evaluation-item label {
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
    font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
    flex: 1;
    margin: 0;
}

.evaluation-buttons {
    display: flex;
    gap: var(--space-4);
}

.eval-btn {
    width: 32px;
    height: 32px;
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
    background: var(--color-surface);
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all var(--duration-fast) var(--ease-standard);
}

.eval-btn:hover {
    background: var(--color-secondary);
}

.eval-btn.active {
    background: var(--color-primary);
    color: var(--color-btn-primary-text);
    border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.eval-btn.success {
    background: rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-success);
    border-color: var(--color-success);
}

.eval-btn.error {
    background: rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-error);
    border-color: var(--color-error);
}

.eval-btn.warning {
    background: rgba(var(--color-warning-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-warning);
    border-color: var(--color-warning);
}

.reflection-field {
    margin-top: var(--space-12);
}

.reflection-field textarea {
    min-height: 100px;
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.actions {
    display: flex;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-top: var(--space-24);
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
}

.preview-table {
    width: 100%;
    border-collapse: collapse;
    margin-top: var(--space-16);
    background: var(--color-surface);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
    table-layout: auto;
}

.preview-table th,
.preview-table td {
    padding: var(--space-8);
    text-align: left;
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-card-border-inner);
    vertical-align: top;
}

.preview-table th {
    background: var(--color-bg-2);
    font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
    color: var(--color-text);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.preview-table .date-cell {
    min-width: 80px;
    width: 80px;
    font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
    color: var(--color-primary);
}

.preview-table .eval-cell {
    min-width: 60px;
    width: 60px;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
}

.preview-table .reflection-cell {
    min-width: 200px;
    max-width: 400px;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    white-space: pre-wrap;
    padding: var(--space-8);
    line-height: var(--line-height-normal);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.export-mode .preview-table {
    width: auto;
    table-layout: auto;
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.export-mode .preview-table .reflection-cell {
    max-width: 350px;
}

.settings-modal {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.settings-content {
    background: var(--color-surface);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    padding: var(--space-24);
    max-width: 500px;
    width: 90%;
    max-height: 80vh;
    overflow-y: auto;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

.settings-header {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    margin-bottom: var(--space-20);
    padding-bottom: var(--space-12);
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-card-border-inner);
}

.close-btn {
    background: none;
    border: none;
    font-size: var(--font-size-xl);
    cursor: pointer;
    color: var(--color-text-secondary);
    padding: var(--space-4);
}

.close-btn:hover {
    color: var(--color-text);
}

.items-manager {
    background: var(--color-bg-3);
    border-radius: var(--radius-base);
    padding: var(--space-16);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
}

.item-list {
    max-height: 200px;
    overflow-y: auto;
    border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
    background: var(--color-surface);
}

.item-row {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: var(--space-8);
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-card-border-inner);
}

.item-row:last-child {
    border-bottom: none;
}

.item-text {
    flex: 1;
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.delete-item-btn {
    background: none;
    border: none;
    color: var(--color-error);
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: var(--space-2);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
}

.delete-item-btn:hover {
    background: rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.1);
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
}

.add-item-form {
    display: flex;
    gap: var(--space-8);
    margin-top: var(--space-12);
}

.github-sync {
    background: var(--color-bg-1);
    border-radius: var(--radius-base);
    padding: var(--space-16);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-16);
}

.github-sync .form-group {
    margin-bottom: var(--space-12);
}

.status-message {
    padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12);
    border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
    font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
    margin-bottom: var(--space-12);
}

.status-message.success {
    background: rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-success);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-success-rgb), 0.2);
}

.status-message.error {
    background: rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.1);
    color: var(--color-error);
    border: 1px solid rgba(var(--color-error-rgb), 0.2);
}

.preview-section {
    margin-top: var(--space-24);
    padding: var(--space-20);
    background: var(--color-surface);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    border: 1px solid var(--color-card-border);
}

.loading-overlay {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    z-index: 2000;
}

.loading-content {
    background: var(--color-surface);
    padding: var(--space-24);
    border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
    text-align: center;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

.loading-spinner {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    border: 4px solid var(--color-border);
    border-top: 4px solid var(--color-primary);
    border-radius: 50%;
    animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
    margin: 0 auto var(--space-16) auto;
}

@keyframes spin {
    0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
    100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .diary-content {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
    
    .navigation {
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
    }
    
    .actions {
        flex-direction: column;
    }
    
    .preview-table {
        font-size: var(--font-size-xs);
    }
    
    .preview-table .reflection-cell {
        max-width: 250px;
    }
}

@media print {
    .navigation,
    .actions,
    .app-header .btn {
        display: none !important;
    }
    
    .preview-table {
        box-shadow: none;
        border: 1px solid #000;
    }
    
    .preview-table th,
    .preview-table td {
        border: 1px solid #000;
    }
}

    <script>
        class DiaryApp {
            constructor() {

            init() {

                this.loadSettings();

            getCurrentWeek() {
                const now = new Date();
                const year = now.getFullYear();
                const firstDayOfYear = new Date(year, 0, 1);
                const pastDaysOfYear = (now - firstDayOfYear) / 86400000;
                const weekNumber = Math.ceil((pastDaysOfYear + firstDayOfYear.getDay() + 1) / 7);
                return `${year}-W${String(weekNumber).padStart(2, '0')}`;
            }
            
            initializeWeekData() {
                if (!this.weekData) {
                    this.weekData = {
                        week: this.currentWeek,
                        goal: '',
                        dailyRecords: this.generateDailyRecords()
                    };
                }
            }
            
            generateDailyRecords() {
                const records = [];
                const [year, week] = this.currentWeek.split('-W');
                const startDate = this.getDateOfWeek(parseInt(year), parseInt(week));
                
                const dayNames = ['æœˆ', 'ç«', 'æ°´', 'æœ¨', 'é‡‘', 'åœŸ', 'æ—¥'];
                
                for (let i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
                    const date = new Date(startDate);
                    date.setDate(date.getDate() + i);
                    
                    const responses = {};
                    this.evaluationItems.forEach(item => {
                        responses[item] = '';
                    });
                    
                    records.push({
                        date: date.toISOString().split('T')[0],
                        dayOfWeek: dayNames[i],
                        responses: responses,
                        reflection: ''
                    });
                }
                
                return records;
            }
            
            getDateOfWeek(year, week) {
                const firstDayOfYear = new Date(year, 0, 1);
                const days = (week - 1) * 7;
                const mondayOfWeek = new Date(firstDayOfYear);
                mondayOfWeek.setDate(firstDayOfYear.getDate() + days - firstDayOfYear.getDay() + 1);
                return mondayOfWeek;
            }
            
            updateWeekDisplay() {
                document.getElementById('currentWeek').textContent = this.currentWeek;
            }
            
            changeWeek(direction) {
                const [year, week] = this.currentWeek.split('-W');
                let newWeek = parseInt(week) + direction;
                let newYear = parseInt(year);
                
                if (newWeek < 1) {
                    newWeek = 52;
                    newYear--;
                } else if (newWeek > 52) {
                    newWeek = 1;
                    newYear++;
                }
                
                this.currentWeek = `${newYear}-W${String(newWeek).padStart(2, '0')}`;
                this.updateWeekDisplay();
                this.initializeWeekData();
                this.renderDiary();
                this.loadData(); // é€±å¤‰æ›´æ™‚ã«ã‚‚ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿èª­è¾¼
            }

            async testConnection() {

            async saveToGitHub(weekData) {
                const token = this.syncSettings.githubToken;
                const owner = this.syncSettings.repoOwner;
                const repo = this.syncSettings.repoName;
                if (!token || !owner || !repo) {
                    console.log('GitHub token not configured');
                    return false;
                }
                const filePath = `data/weeks/${weekData.week}.json`;
                const content = btoa(unescape(encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(weekData, null, 2))));
        
                // ã¾ãšæ—¢å­˜ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®SHAã‚’å–å¾—ï¼ˆæ›´æ–°ã®å ´åˆã«å¿…è¦ï¼‰
                let sha = null;
                try {
                    const getResponse = await fetch(
                        `https://api.github.com/repos/${owner}/${repo}/contents/${filePath}`,
                        {
                            headers: {
                                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                                'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json'
                            }
                        }
                    );
                    if (getResponse.ok) {
                        const fileData = await getResponse.json();
                        sha = fileData.sha;
                    }
                } catch (e) {
                    // ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ãªã„å ´åˆã¯æ–°è¦ä½œæˆ
                    console.log('File does not exist, will create new');
                }
                // ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã¾ãŸã¯æ›´æ–°
                const putData = {
                    message: `Save diary data for ${weekData.week}`,
                    content: content,
                    branch: 'main'
                };
                if (sha) {
                    putData.sha = sha; // æ›´æ–°ã®å ´åˆã¯SHAã‚’æŒ‡å®š
                }
                try {
                    const response = await fetch(
                        `https://api.github.com/repos/${owner}/${repo}/contents/${filePath}`,
                        {
                            method: 'PUT',
                            headers: {
                                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                                'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json',
                                //'X-GitHub-Api-Version': '2022-11-28'
                                'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify(putData)
                        }
                    );
                    if (response.ok) {
                        console.log('Successfully saved to GitHub');
                        return true;
                    } else {
                        const errorData = await response.json();
                        console.error('GitHub API error:', errorData);
                        return false;
                    }
                    //console.log('GitHub API response:', response);
                    //return response.ok;
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('GitHub API error:', error);
                    return false;
                }
            }
            
            async loadWeekData(week) {
                const token = this.syncSettings.githubToken;
                const owner = this.syncSettings.repoOwner;
                const repo = this.syncSettings.repoName;
                if (!token || !owner || !repo) {
                    console.log('GitHub settings not configured');
                    return null;
                }

                try {
                    const filePath = `data/weeks/${week}.json`;
                    // ã“ã“ã§ã¯ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã¨ã—ã¦ã€fetch APIã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸä¾‹ã‚’ç¤ºã™
                    const response = await fetch(
                        `https://api.github.com/repos/${owner}/${repo}/contents/${filePath}`,
                        {
                            headers: {
                                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                                'Accept': 'application/vnd.github.raw'
                            }
                        }
                    );

                    if (response.ok) {
                        const data = await response.json();
                        console.log('Successfully loaded from GitHub');
                        return data;
                    } else if (response.status === 404) {
                        console.log('No saved data found for week:', week);
                        return null;
                    } else {
                        throw new Error(`GitHub API error: ${response.status}`);
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    console.log('No saved data found for week:', week);
                    return null;
                }
            }
