    <script>
        class DiaryApp {
            constructor() {
                this.currentWeek = this.getCurrentWeek();
                this.currentView = 'diary';
                this.weekData = null;
                this.syncSettings = {
                    githubToken: '',
                    repoOwner: '',
                    repoName: ''
                };
                
                // ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆé …ç›®ã‚’å®šç¾©
                this.defaultItems = [
                    "ä»Šé€±ã®ç›®æ¨™",
                    "ãƒã‚¤ãƒ‹ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "è‡ªåˆ†ã®æ™‚é–“ã‚’ã§ãã‚‹ã ã‘ä½¿ã‚ãªã„ã€‚",
                    "äººã®ã“ã¨ã‚’æ‚ªãæ€ã‚ãªã„ã€‚",
                    "ãµã¨ã—ãŸç¬é–“ã®å¿ƒã§äººã«ä¸è¶³ã›ãšã€æ„Ÿè¬ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "æ¯æ—¥è¦ªãŒå–œã‚“ã§ãã ã•ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç ”ç©¶ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "å®Ÿè¡Œã™ã‚‹ã¨ãã¯å¿ƒã‹ã‚‰ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "æœèµ·ããŸæ™‚ã«ã¾ãšã€è¦ªã¸ã®æ„Ÿè¬ã‹ã‚‰ã€‚",
                    "äººã«è¿·æƒ‘ã‚’ã‹ã‘ãªã„ã€‚",
                    "ã˜ã£ã¨ã—ã¨ã‚‰ã‚“ã€è¦ªã®æ€ã„ã«ã¯ã¾ã‚ŠãŸã„ã€ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã„ã¨æ€ã£ã¦æ—¥ã€…ã‚’é€šã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "å› ç¸è‡ªè¦šã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "æ¯æ—¥å‹‰å¼·ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "å­—ã‚’ç¶ºéº—ã«æ›¸ãã€‚",
                    "èº«ã ã—ãªã¿ã‚’æ•´ãˆã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "ä½“å¹¹ã€ç­‹ãƒˆãƒ¬ã€æŸ”è»Ÿã€ãƒãƒ¬ã‚¨",
                    "ã‚„ã‚‹ã¹ãã“ã¨ã‚’çµ‚ã‚ã‚‰ã›ã¦ã‹ã‚‰å¯ã‚‹ã€‚"
                ];
                
                this.evaluationItems = [...this.defaultItems.slice(1)]; // "ä»Šé€±ã®ç›®æ¨™"ã‚’é™¤ã
                
                this.checkOptions = [
                    { value: 'â­•ï¸', label: 'â­•ï¸', color: '#22c55e', class: 'success' },
                    { value: 'âœ–ï¸', label: 'âœ–ï¸', color: '#ef4444', class: 'error' },
                    { value: 'â–³', label: 'â–³', color: '#f59e0b', class: 'warning' }
                ];
                
                this.init();
            }
            
            init() {
                this.hideLoading();
                this.updateWeekDisplay();
                this.initializeWeekData();
                this.renderDiary();
                this.loadData(); // ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªèµ·å‹•æ™‚ã«åŒæœŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’è‡ªå‹•èª­è¾¼
                this.loadSettings();
            }
            
            getCurrentWeek() {
                const now = new Date();
                const year = now.getFullYear();
                const firstDayOfYear = new Date(year, 0, 1);
                const pastDaysOfYear = (now - firstDayOfYear) / 86400000;
                const weekNumber = Math.ceil((pastDaysOfYear + firstDayOfYear.getDay() + 1) / 7);
                return `${year}-W${String(weekNumber).padStart(2, '0')}`;
            }
            
            initializeWeekData() {
                if (!this.weekData) {
                    this.weekData = {
                        week: this.currentWeek,
                        goal: '',
                        dailyRecords: this.generateDailyRecords()
                    };
                }
            }
            
            generateDailyRecords() {
                const records = [];
                const [year, week] = this.currentWeek.split('-W');
                const startDate = this.getDateOfWeek(parseInt(year), parseInt(week));
                
                const dayNames = ['æœˆ', 'ç«', 'æ°´', 'æœ¨', 'é‡‘', 'åœŸ', 'æ—¥'];
                
                for (let i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
                    const date = new Date(startDate);
                    date.setDate(date.getDate() + i);
                    
                    const responses = {};
                    this.evaluationItems.forEach(item => {
                        responses[item] = '';
                    });
                    
                    records.push({
                        date: date.toISOString().split('T')[0],
                        dayOfWeek: dayNames[i],
                        responses: responses,
                        reflection: ''
                    });
                }
                
                return records;
            }
            
            getDateOfWeek(year, week) {
                const firstDayOfYear = new Date(year, 0, 1);
                const days = (week - 1) * 7;
                const mondayOfWeek = new Date(firstDayOfYear);
                mondayOfWeek.setDate(firstDayOfYear.getDate() + days - firstDayOfYear.getDay() + 1);
                return mondayOfWeek;
            }
            
            updateWeekDisplay() {
                document.getElementById('currentWeek').textContent = this.currentWeek;
            }

            //ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒç©ºã‹ã©ã†ã‹ã‚’ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°
            isWeekDataEmpty(weekData) {
                if (!weekData) return true;
                if (weekData.goal && weekData.goal.trim() !== '') return false;
                for (const record of weekData.dailyRecords) {
                    for (const response of Object.values(record.responses)) {
                        if (response && response.trim() !== '') return false;
                    }
                    if (record.reflection && record.reflection.trim() !== '') return false;
                }
                return true;
            }
            
            async changeWeek(direction) {
                    // ç¾åœ¨ã®é€±ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’è‡ªå‹•ä¿å­˜ï¼ˆGitHubã«è¨­å®šãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã®ã¿ï¼‰
                if (this.syncSettings.githubToken && this.syncSettings.repoOwner && this.syncSettings.repoName) {
                    // ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒç©ºã§ãªã„å ´åˆã®ã¿ä¿å­˜
                    const hasData = this.weekData && !this.isWeekDataEmpty(this.weekData);
                    
                    if (hasData) {
                        this.showLoading();
                        this.showSyncStatus('ğŸ’¾ è‡ªå‹•ä¿å­˜ä¸­...', 'loading');
                        await this.saveData();

                    }
                }

                const [year, week] = this.currentWeek.split('-W');
                let newWeek = parseInt(week) + direction;
                let newYear = parseInt(year);
                
                if (newWeek < 1) {
                    newWeek = 52;
                    newYear--;
                } else if (newWeek > 52) {
                    newWeek = 1;
                    newYear++;
                }
                
                this.currentWeek = `${newYear}-W${String(newWeek).padStart(2, '0')}`;
                this.updateWeekDisplay();
                this.weekData = null; // é€±å¤‰æ›´æ™‚ã«ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ
                this.initializeWeekData();
                this.renderDiary();
                this.loadData(); // é€±å¤‰æ›´æ™‚ã«ã‚‚ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿èª­è¾¼
            }
            
            showDiary() {
                this.currentView = 'diary';
                document.getElementById('diaryView').classList.remove('hidden');
                document.getElementById('previewView').classList.add('hidden');
                this.renderDiary();
            }
            
            showPreview() {
                this.currentView = 'preview';
                document.getElementById('diaryView').classList.add('hidden');
                document.getElementById('previewView').classList.remove('hidden');
                this.renderPreview();
            }
            
            showSettings() {
                document.getElementById('settingsModal').classList.remove('hidden');
                this.renderSettings();
            }
            
            hideSettings() {
                document.getElementById('settingsModal').classList.add('hidden');
            }
            
            renderDiary() {
                const weekGoal = document.getElementById('weekGoal');
                weekGoal.value = this.weekData.goal;
                
                weekGoal.addEventListener('input', () => {
                    this.weekData.goal = weekGoal.value;
                });
                
                const container = document.getElementById('dailyEntries');
                container.innerHTML = '';
                
                this.weekData.dailyRecords.forEach((record, dayIndex) => {
                    const dayEntry = document.createElement('div');
                    dayEntry.className = 'daily-entry';
                    
                    const date = new Date(record.date);
                    const formattedDate = `${date.getMonth() + 1}/${date.getDate()}`;
                    
                    dayEntry.innerHTML = `
                        <h4>${formattedDate} (${record.dayOfWeek})</h4>
                        <div class="evaluation-grid">
                            ${this.evaluationItems.map(item => `
                                <div class="evaluation-item">
                                    <label>${item}</label>
                                    <div class="evaluation-buttons">
                                        ${this.checkOptions.map(option => `
                                            <button type="button" 
                                                    class="eval-btn ${option.class} ${record.responses[item] === option.value ? 'active' : ''}" 
                                                    onclick="diaryApp.setEvaluation(${dayIndex}, '${item}', '${option.value}')">
                                                ${option.value}
                                            </button>
                                        `).join('')}
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            `).join('')}
                        </div>
                        <div class="reflection-field">
                            <label class="form-label">æ„Ÿæƒ³ãƒ»æ°—ã¥ã</label>
                            <textarea class="form-control" rows="3" 
                                placeholder="ä»Šæ—¥ã®æ„Ÿæƒ³ã‚„æ°—ã¥ãã‚’è¨˜éŒ²ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„"
                                onchange="diaryApp.setReflection(${dayIndex}, this.value)">${record.reflection}</textarea>
                        </div>
                    `;
                    
                    container.appendChild(dayEntry);
                });
            }
            
            setEvaluation(dayIndex, item, value) {
                // åŒã˜å€¤ã®å ´åˆã¯ç©ºã«ã™ã‚‹ï¼ˆãƒˆã‚°ãƒ«æ©Ÿèƒ½ï¼‰
                if (this.weekData.dailyRecords[dayIndex].responses[item] === value) {
                    this.weekData.dailyRecords[dayIndex].responses[item] = '';
                } else {
                    this.weekData.dailyRecords[dayIndex].responses[item] = value;
                }
                this.renderDiary();
            }
            
            setReflection(dayIndex, value) {
                this.weekData.dailyRecords[dayIndex].reflection = value;
            }
            
            renderPreview() {
                const container = document.getElementById('previewContent');
                
                let html = `
                    <div class="preview-header">
                        <h4>é€±é–“ç›®æ¨™: ${this.weekData.goal || 'æœªè¨­å®š'}</h4>
                        <p>æœŸé–“: ${this.currentWeek}</p>
                    </div>
                    
                    <table class="preview-table">
                        <thead>
                            <tr>
                                <th class="date-cell">æ—¥ä»˜</th>
                                ${this.evaluationItems.map(item => `<th class="eval-cell">${item.length > 10 ? item.substring(0, 10) + '...' : item}</th>`).join('')}
                                <th class="reflection-cell">æ„Ÿæƒ³ãƒ»æ°—ã¥ã</th>
                            </tr>
                        </thead>
                        <tbody>
                            ${this.weekData.dailyRecords.map(record => {
                                const date = new Date(record.date);
                                const formattedDate = `${date.getMonth() + 1}/${date.getDate()}`;
                                
                                return `
                                    <tr>
                                        <td class="date-cell">${formattedDate}(${record.dayOfWeek})</td>
                                        ${this.evaluationItems.map(item => `
                                            <td class="eval-cell">${record.responses[item] || ''}</td>
                                        `).join('')}
                                        <td class="reflection-cell">${record.reflection || ''}</td>
                                    </tr>
                                `;
                            }).join('')}
                        </tbody>
                    </table>
                `;
                
                container.innerHTML = html;
            }
            
            renderSettings() {
                // è©•ä¾¡é …ç›®ä¸€è¦§ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
                const itemsList = document.getElementById('itemsList');
                itemsList.innerHTML = '';
                
                this.evaluationItems.forEach((item, index) => {
                    const itemRow = document.createElement('div');
                    itemRow.className = 'item-row';
                    itemRow.innerHTML = `
                        <span class="item-text">${item}</span>
                        <button class="delete-item-btn" onclick="diaryApp.removeItem(${index})">å‰Šé™¤</button>
                    `;
                    itemsList.appendChild(itemRow);
                });
                
                // GitHubè¨­å®šã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
                document.getElementById('githubToken').value = this.syncSettings.githubToken;
                document.getElementById('repoOwner').value = this.syncSettings.repoOwner;
                document.getElementById('repoName').value = this.syncSettings.repoName;
            }
            
            addItem() {
                const input = document.getElementById('newItemInput');
                const newItem = input.value.trim();
                
                if (newItem && !this.evaluationItems.includes(newItem)) {
                    this.evaluationItems.push(newItem);
                    input.value = '';
                    this.renderSettings();
                    this.initializeWeekData();
                    this.renderDiary();
                }
            }
            
            removeItem(index) {
                this.evaluationItems.splice(index, 1);
                this.renderSettings();
                this.initializeWeekData();
                this.renderDiary();
            }
            
            resetToDefaults() {
                if (confirm('ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆè¨­å®šã«æˆ»ã—ã¾ã™ã‹ï¼Ÿç¾åœ¨ã®é …ç›®ã¯ã™ã¹ã¦å‰Šé™¤ã•ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚')) {
                    this.evaluationItems = [...this.defaultItems.slice(1)];
                    this.renderSettings();
                    this.initializeWeekData();
                    this.renderDiary();
                }
            }
            
            saveSettings() {
                // GitHubè¨­å®šã‚’ä¿å­˜
                this.syncSettings.githubToken = document.getElementById('githubToken').value;
                this.syncSettings.repoOwner = document.getElementById('repoOwner').value;
                this.syncSettings.repoName = document.getElementById('repoName').value;
                
                this.showStatusMessage('è¨­å®šãŒä¿å­˜ã•ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸ', 'success');
                this.hideSettings();
            }
            
            loadSettings() {
                // å®Ÿéš›ã®ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã§ã¯localStorageã®ä»£ã‚ã‚Šã«ãƒ¡ãƒ¢ãƒªå¤‰æ•°ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨
                // ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ç’°å¢ƒã§ã®localStorageåˆ¶é™ã®ãŸã‚
            }
            
            async testConnection() {
                const statusDiv = document.getElementById('connectionStatus');
                statusDiv.innerHTML = '<div class="status-message loading">æ¥ç¶šãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆä¸­...</div>';
                
                try {
                    const token = document.getElementById('githubToken').value;
                    const owner = document.getElementById('repoOwner').value;
                    const repo = document.getElementById('repoName').value;
                    
                    if (!token || !owner || !repo) {
                        throw new Error('ã™ã¹ã¦ã®ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰ã‚’å…¥åŠ›ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„');
                    }
                    
                    const response = await fetch(`https://api.github.com/repos/${owner}/${repo}`, {
                        headers: {
                            'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                            'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json'
                        }
                    });
                    
                    if (response.ok) {
                        statusDiv.innerHTML = '<div class="status-message success">âœ… æ¥ç¶šæˆåŠŸ</div>';
                    } else {
                        throw new Error(`æ¥ç¶šã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: ${response.status}`);
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    statusDiv.innerHTML = `<div class="status-message error">âŒ ${error.message}</div>`;
                }
            }
            
            async saveData() {
                this.showLoading();
                
                try {
                    const success = await this.saveToGitHub(this.weekData);
                    if (success) {
                        this.showSyncStatus('âœ… ä¿å­˜å®Œäº†', 'success');
                    } else {
                        this.showSyncStatus('âŒ ä¿å­˜å¤±æ•—', 'error');
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Save error:', error);
                    this.showSyncStatus('âŒ ä¿å­˜ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼', 'error');
                } finally {
                    this.hideLoading();
                }
            }
            
            async loadData() {
                this.showSyncStatus('ğŸ”„ åŒæœŸä¸­...', 'loading');
                
                try {
                    const data = await this.loadWeekData(this.currentWeek);
                    if (data) {
                        this.weekData = data;
                        this.renderDiary();
                        this.showSyncStatus('âœ… åŒæœŸå®Œäº†', 'success');
                    } else {
                        this.weekData = null;
                        this.initializeWeekData();
                        this.showSyncStatus('â„¹ï¸ æ–°è¦é€±', 'loading');
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Load error:', error);
                    this.showSyncStatus('âŒ åŒæœŸã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼', 'error');
                }
            }
            
            async saveToGitHub(weekData) {
                const token = this.syncSettings.githubToken;
                const owner = this.syncSettings.repoOwner;
                const repo = this.syncSettings.repoName;
                if (!token || !owner || !repo) {
                    console.log('GitHub token not configured');
                    return false;
                }
                const filePath = `data/weeks/${weekData.week}.json`;
                const content = btoa(unescape(encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(weekData, null, 2))));
        
                // ã¾ãšæ—¢å­˜ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®SHAã‚’å–å¾—ï¼ˆæ›´æ–°ã®å ´åˆã«å¿…è¦ï¼‰
                let sha = null;
                try {
                    const getResponse = await fetch(
                        `https://api.github.com/repos/${owner}/${repo}/contents/${filePath}`,
                        {
                            headers: {
                                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                                'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json'
                            }
                        }
                    );
                    if (getResponse.ok) {
                        const fileData = await getResponse.json();
                        sha = fileData.sha;
                    }
                } catch (e) {
                    // ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ãªã„å ´åˆã¯æ–°è¦ä½œæˆ
                    console.log('File does not exist, will create new');
                }
                // ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã¾ãŸã¯æ›´æ–°
                const putData = {
                    message: `Save diary data for ${weekData.week}`,
                    content: content,
                    branch: 'main'
                };
                if (sha) {
                    putData.sha = sha; // æ›´æ–°ã®å ´åˆã¯SHAã‚’æŒ‡å®š
                }
                try {
                    const response = await fetch(
                        `https://api.github.com/repos/${owner}/${repo}/contents/${filePath}`,
                        {
                            method: 'PUT',
                            headers: {
                                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                                'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json',
                                //'X-GitHub-Api-Version': '2022-11-28'
                                'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify(putData)
                        }
                    );
                    if (response.ok) {
                        console.log('Successfully saved to GitHub');
                        return true;
                    } else {
                        const errorData = await response.json();
                        console.error('GitHub API error:', errorData);
                        return false;
                    }
                    //console.log('GitHub API response:', response);
                    //return response.ok;
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('GitHub API error:', error);
                    return false;
                }
            }
            
            async loadWeekData(week) {
                const token = this.syncSettings.githubToken;
                const owner = this.syncSettings.repoOwner;
                const repo = this.syncSettings.repoName;
                if (!token || !owner || !repo) {
                    console.log('GitHub settings not configured');
                    return null;
                }

                try {
                    const filePath = `data/weeks/${week}.json`;
                    // ã“ã“ã§ã¯ã‚µãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ã¨ã—ã¦ã€fetch APIã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã—ãŸä¾‹ã‚’ç¤ºã™
                    const response = await fetch(
                        `https://api.github.com/repos/${owner}/${repo}/contents/${filePath}`,
                        {
                            headers: {
                                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                                'Accept': 'application/vnd.github.raw'
                            }
                        }
                    );

                    if (response.ok) {
                        const data = await response.json();
                        console.log('Successfully loaded from GitHub');
                        return data;
                    } else if (response.status === 404) {
                        console.log('No saved data found for week:', week);
                        return null;
                    } else {
                        throw new Error(`GitHub API error: ${response.status}`);
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    console.log('No saved data found for week:', week);
                    return null;
                }
            }
            
            async exportAsImage() {
                this.showLoading();
                
                try {
                    // ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã«åˆ‡ã‚Šæ›¿ãˆ
                    this.showPreview();
                    
                    // å°‘ã—å¾…ã£ã¦ã‹ã‚‰ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ—ãƒãƒ£ï¼ˆãƒ¬ãƒ³ãƒ€ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°å®Œäº†ã‚’å¾…ã¤ï¼‰
                    await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 100));
                    
                    const element = document.getElementById('previewContent');
                    element.classList.add('export-mode');
                    
                    const options = {
                        scale: 3,                    // é«˜è§£åƒåº¦
                        useCORS: true,
                        allowTaint: true,
                        backgroundColor: '#ffffff',
                        width: element.scrollWidth,
                        height: element.scrollHeight,
                        windowWidth: element.scrollWidth,
                        windowHeight: element.scrollHeight,
                        scrollX: 0,
                        scrollY: 0,
                        imageTimeout: 60000
                    };
                    
                    const canvas = await html2canvas(element, options);
                    
                    // ç”»åƒã‚’ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰
                    const link = document.createElement('a');
                    link.download = `diary-${this.currentWeek}.png`;
                    link.href = canvas.toDataURL('image/png');
                    link.click();
                    
                    element.classList.remove('export-mode');
                    this.showStatusMessage('ç”»åƒãŒãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã•ã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸ', 'success');
                    
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('Export error:', error);
                    this.showStatusMessage('ç”»åƒå‡ºåŠ›ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: ' + error.message, 'error');
                } finally {
                    this.hideLoading();
                }
            }
            
            showLoading() {
                document.getElementById('loadingOverlay').classList.remove('hidden');
            }
            
            hideLoading() {
                document.getElementById('loadingOverlay').classList.add('hidden');
            }
            
            showSyncStatus(message, type) {
                const statusElement = document.getElementById('syncStatus');
                statusElement.textContent = message;
                statusElement.className = `sync-status ${type}`;
                // 3ç§’å¾Œã«æ¶ˆå»ï¼ˆsuccessã¨errorã®å ´åˆï¼‰
                if (type !== 'loading') {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        statusElement.textContent = '';
                        statusElement.className = 'sync-status';
                    }, 3000);
                }
            }
            
            showStatusMessage(message, type) {
                // ä¸€æ™‚çš„ãªãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸è¡¨ç¤ºï¼ˆToasté¢¨ï¼‰
                const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');
                messageDiv.className = `status-message ${type}`;
                messageDiv.textContent = message;
                messageDiv.style.position = 'fixed';
                messageDiv.style.top = '20px';
                messageDiv.style.right = '20px';
                messageDiv.style.zIndex = '3000';
                messageDiv.style.minWidth = '250px';
                
                document.body.appendChild(messageDiv);
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    document.body.removeChild(messageDiv);
                }, 3000);
            }
        }
        
        // ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³åˆæœŸåŒ–
        const diaryApp = new DiaryApp();
    </script>
</body>

summary.text:
<analysis>
[Chronological Review: 
1. Initial request - User asked how to preview HTML/CSS/JS projects
2. User asked how to use the app and sync functionality
3. Main issue emerged - "å‡¦ç†ä¸­" (Processing) screen wouldn't disappear, 404 errors
4. Fixed loading overlay CSS issue with `!important`
5. Fixed data loading to avoid 404 errors by using localStorage
6. Switched from repository_dispatch to direct GitHub API file operations
7. Successfully implemented save/load but discovered 422 error on file updates
8. Root cause identified: SHA not being retrieved properly for existing files
9. Debugging revealed Accept header returning file content instead of metadata
10. Current state: Trying to diagnose why GitHub API returns file content instead of metadata with SHA]

[Intent Mapping:
- "html,css,jsã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆã§ç”»é¢ãŒã©ã†ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‹ãƒ—ãƒ¬ãƒ“ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã™ã‚‹ã®ã£ã¦ã©ã†ã‚„ã£ã¦ã‚„ã‚‹ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸã£ã‘ï¼Ÿ" - How to preview projects
- "ã“ã®ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã¯ã©ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¦ä½¿ã†ã®ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†ã‹ï¼Ÿ" - Understand app usage and sync
- "å‡¦ç†ä¸­ã¨å‡ºã¦é€²ã¿ã¾ã›ã‚“" - Fix stuck loading screen
- "ä¿å­˜ã¯ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ãªãå‹•ä½œã—ã¾ã™ãŒã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ä¿å­˜ã«ä½¿ã†ãƒªãƒã‚¸ãƒˆãƒªã‚’è¦‹ã¦ã¿ã¦ã‚‚ã€ç‰¹ã«å¤‰åŒ–ã¯è¦‹ã‚‰ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“" - GitHub save not working
- "é€±ãŒå¤‰ã‚ã‚‹ã¨ãã«ã¯ã€æ–°è¦é€±ã§ãªã‘ã‚Œã°ã€å¤‰æ›´ã‚’åŒæœŸã—ã¦ä¿å­˜ã—ã¦ãŠã‘ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ãŸã„" - Auto-save on week change
- "ç¾åœ¨ä¸Šæ›¸ãä¿å­˜ãŒå‡ºæ¥ã¦ã„ãªã„" - 422 error preventing file updates

[Technical Inventory:
- Single-file HTML application with embedded CSS and JavaScript
- GitHub API Contents endpoint for file operations
- Personal Access Token authentication
- Accept headers: `application/vnd.github+json`, `application/vnd.github.raw`
- Base64 encoding/decoding for file content
- SHA (Secure Hash Algorithm) for version control
- LocalStorage for offline data
- html2canvas for image export
- Weekly diary data structure with evaluations and reflections]

[Code Archaeology:
- index.html: Main application file (~1729 lines)
- Key methods:
  - `saveToGitHub()` (line ~1520): Encodes data, gets SHA, PUTs to GitHub
  - `loadWeekData()` (line ~1595): Fetches file from GitHub with .raw format
  - `changeWeek()` (line ~1226): Auto-saves before switching weeks
  - `isWeekDataEmpty()` (line ~1213): Checks if week has data
- Issue location: Line 1528-1560, SHA retrieval returns file content instead of metadata
- Problem: Using `Accept: application/vnd.github+json` but receiving JSON data instead of file metadata]

);

```

/* Accessibility */
.sr-only {
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;

  padding: 0;

  overflow: hidden;
  clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
  white-space: nowrap;
  border-width: 0;
}

:focus-visible {

}

/* Custom App Styles */
.app-container {

    <script>
        class DiaryApp {
            constructor() {
                this.currentWeek = this.getCurrentWeek();
                this.currentView = 'diary';
                this.weekData = null;
                this.syncSettings = {
                    githubToken: '',
                    repoOwner: '',
                    repoName: ''
                };
                
                // ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆé …ç›®ã‚’å®šç¾©
                this.defaultItems = [
                    "ä»Šé€±ã®ç›®æ¨™",
                    "ãƒã‚¤ãƒ‹ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "è‡ªåˆ†ã®æ™‚é–“ã‚’ã§ãã‚‹ã ã‘ä½¿ã‚ãªã„ã€‚",
                    "äººã®ã“ã¨ã‚’æ‚ªãæ€ã‚ãªã„ã€‚",
                    "ãµã¨ã—ãŸç¬é–“ã®å¿ƒã§äººã«ä¸è¶³ã›ãšã€æ„Ÿè¬ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "æ¯æ—¥è¦ªãŒå–œã‚“ã§ãã ã•ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’ç ”ç©¶ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "å®Ÿè¡Œã™ã‚‹ã¨ãã¯å¿ƒã‹ã‚‰ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "æœèµ·ããŸæ™‚ã«ã¾ãšã€è¦ªã¸ã®æ„Ÿè¬ã‹ã‚‰ã€‚",
                    "äººã«è¿·æƒ‘ã‚’ã‹ã‘ãªã„ã€‚",
                    "ã˜ã£ã¨ã—ã¨ã‚‰ã‚“ã€è¦ªã®æ€ã„ã«ã¯ã¾ã‚ŠãŸã„ã€ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã„ã¨æ€ã£ã¦æ—¥ã€…ã‚’é€šã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "å› ç¸è‡ªè¦šã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "æ¯æ—¥å‹‰å¼·ã™ã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "å­—ã‚’ç¶ºéº—ã«æ›¸ãã€‚",
                    "èº«ã ã—ãªã¿ã‚’æ•´ãˆã‚‹ã€‚",
                    "ä½“å¹¹ã€ç­‹ãƒˆãƒ¬ã€æŸ”è»Ÿã€ãƒãƒ¬ã‚¨",
                    "ã‚„ã‚‹ã¹ãã“ã¨ã‚’çµ‚ã‚ã‚‰ã›ã¦ã‹ã‚‰å¯ã‚‹ã€‚"
                ];
                
                this.evaluationItems = [...this.defaultItems.slice(1)]; // "ä»Šé€±ã®ç›®æ¨™"ã‚’é™¤ã
                
                this.checkOptions = [
                    { value: 'â­•ï¸', label: 'â­•ï¸', color: '#22c55e', class: 'success' },
                    { value: 'âœ–ï¸', label: 'âœ–ï¸', color: '#ef4444', class: 'error' },
                    { value: 'â–³', label: 'â–³', color: '#f59e0b', class: 'warning' }
                ];
                
                this.init();
            }
            
            init() {
                this.hideLoading();
                this.updateWeekDisplay();
                this.initializeWeekData();
                this.renderDiary();
                this.loadData(); // ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªèµ·å‹•æ™‚ã«åŒæœŸãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’è‡ªå‹•èª­è¾¼
                this.loadSettings();
            }
            
            getCurrentWeek() {
                const now = new Date();
                const year = now.getFullYear();
                const firstDayOfYear = new Date(year, 0, 1);
                const pastDaysOfYear = (now - firstDayOfYear) / 86400000;
                const weekNumber = Math.ceil((pastDaysOfYear + firstDayOfYear.getDay() + 1) / 7);
                return `${year}-W${String(weekNumber).padStart(2, '0')}`;
            }
            
            initializeWeekData() {
                if (!this.weekData) {
                    this.weekData = {
                        week: this.currentWeek,
                        goal: '',
                        dailyRecords: this.generateDailyRecords()
                    };
                }
            }
            
            generateDailyRecords() {
                const records = [];
                const [year, week] = this.currentWeek.split('-W');
                const startDate = this.getDateOfWeek(parseInt(year), parseInt(week));
                
                const dayNames = ['æœˆ', 'ç«', 'æ°´', 'æœ¨', 'é‡‘', 'åœŸ', 'æ—¥'];
                
                for (let i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
                    const date = new Date(startDate);
                    date.setDate(date.getDate() + i);
                    
                    const responses = {};
                    this.evaluationItems.forEach(item => {
                        responses[item] = '';
                    });
                    
                    records.push({
                        date: date.toISOString().split('T')[0],
                        dayOfWeek: dayNames[i],
                        responses: responses,
                        reflection: ''
                    });
                }
                
                return records;
            }
            
            getDateOfWeek(year, week) {
                const firstDayOfYear = new Date(year, 0, 1);
                const days = (week - 1) * 7;
                const mondayOfWeek = new Date(firstDayOfYear);
                mondayOfWeek.setDate(firstDayOfYear.getDate() + days - firstDayOfYear.getDay() + 1);
                return mondayOfWeek;
            }
            
            updateWeekDisplay() {
                document.getElementById('currentWeek').textContent = this.currentWeek;
            }

            //ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒç©ºã‹ã©ã†ã‹ã‚’ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã™ã‚‹é–¢æ•°
            isWeekDataEmpty(weekData) {
                if (!weekData) return true;
                if (weekData.goal && weekData.goal.trim() !== '') return false;
                for (const record of weekData.dailyRecords) {
                    for (const response of Object.values(record.responses)) {
                        if (response && response.trim() !== '') return false;
                    }
                    if (record.reflection && record.reflection.trim() !== '') return false;
                }
                return true;
            }
            
            async changeWeek(direction) {
                    // ç¾åœ¨ã®é€±ã®ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’è‡ªå‹•ä¿å­˜ï¼ˆGitHubã«è¨­å®šãŒã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã®ã¿ï¼‰
                if (this.syncSettings.githubToken && this.syncSettings.repoOwner && this.syncSettings.repoName) {
                    // ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒç©ºã§ãªã„å ´åˆã®ã¿ä¿å­˜
                    const hasData = this.weekData && !this.isWeekDataEmpty(this.weekData);
                    
                    if (hasData) {
                        this.showLoading();
                        this.showSyncStatus('ğŸ’¾ è‡ªå‹•ä¿å­˜ä¸­...', 'loading');
                        await this.saveData();

                    }
                }

                const [year, week] = this.currentWeek.split('-W');
                let newWeek = parseInt(week) + direction;
                let newYear = parseInt(year);
                
                if (newWeek < 1) {
                    newWeek = 52;
                    newYear--;
                } else if (newWeek > 52) {
                    newWeek = 1;
                    newYear++;
                }
                
                this.currentWeek = `${newYear}-W${String(newWeek).padStart(2, '0')}`;
                this.updateWeekDisplay();
                this.weekData = null; // é€±å¤‰æ›´æ™‚ã«ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ
                this.initializeWeekData();

            }

            renderDiary() {

                weekGoal.value = this.weekData.goal;

                    container.appendChild(dayEntry);

            setEvaluation(dayIndex, item, value) {
                // åŒã˜å€¤ã®å ´åˆã¯ç©ºã«ã™ã‚‹ï¼ˆãƒˆã‚°ãƒ«æ©Ÿèƒ½ï¼‰
                if (this.weekData.dailyRecords[dayIndex].responses[item] === value) {

            async testConnection() {
                const statusDiv = document.getElementById('connectionStatus');
                statusDiv.innerHTML = '<div class="status-message loading">æ¥ç¶šãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆä¸­...</div>';

            async loadData() {

                    if (data) {

            async saveToGitHub(weekData) {
                const token = this.syncSettings.githubToken;
                const owner = this.syncSettings.repoOwner;
                const repo = this.syncSettings.repoName;
                if (!token || !owner || !repo) {
                    console.log('GitHub token not configured');
                    return false;
                }
                const filePath = `data/weeks/${weekData.week}.json`;
                const content = btoa(unescape(encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(weekData, null, 2))));
        
                // ã¾ãšæ—¢å­˜ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®SHAã‚’å–å¾—ï¼ˆæ›´æ–°ã®å ´åˆã«å¿…è¦ï¼‰
                let sha = null;
                try {
                    console.log('Checking for existing file:', filePath);
                    const getResponse = await fetch(
                        `https://api.github.com/repos/${owner}/${repo}/contents/${filePath}`,
                        {
                            headers: {
                                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                                'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json'
                            },
                            cache: 'no-store' // ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ã‚’ç„¡åŠ¹åŒ–ã—ã¦æœ€æ–°æƒ…å ±ã‚’å–å¾—
                        }
                    );

                    console.log('GET response status:', getResponse.status);

                    if (getResponse.ok) {
                        const fileData = await getResponse.json();
                        console.log('ğŸ“¦ File data received:', fileData); // ãƒ‡ãƒãƒƒã‚°: å…¨ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
                        console.log('ğŸ” Looking for SHA in:', Object.keys(fileData)); // ã‚­ãƒ¼ä¸€è¦§
                        sha = fileData.sha;
                        console.log('âœ… Found existing file, SHA:', sha);
                    } else if (getResponse.status === 404) {
                        console.log('â„¹ï¸ File does not exist, will create new');
                    } else {
                        console.warn('âš ï¸ Unexpected status:', getResponse.status);
                        const errorData = await getResponse.json();
                        console.warn('Error data:', errorData);
                    }
                } catch (e) {
                    // ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒå­˜åœ¨ã—ãªã„å ´åˆã¯æ–°è¦ä½œæˆ
                    console.log('File does not exist, will create new');
                }

                console.log('SHA before PUT:', sha);
                // ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ä½œæˆã¾ãŸã¯æ›´æ–°
                const putData = {
                    message: `Save diary data for ${weekData.week}`,
                    content: content,
                    branch: 'main'
                };
                if (sha) {
                    putData.sha = sha; // æ›´æ–°ã®å ´åˆã¯SHAã‚’æŒ‡å®š
                }
                try {
                    const response = await fetch(
                        `https://api.github.com/repos/${owner}/${repo}/contents/${filePath}`,
                        {
                            method: 'PUT',
                            headers: {
                                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                                'Accept': 'application/vnd.github+json',
                                //'X-GitHub-Api-Version': '2022-11-28'
                                'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify(putData)
                        }
                    );
                    if (response.ok) {
                        console.log('Successfully saved to GitHub');
                        return true;
                    } else {
                        const errorData = await response.json();
                        console.error('GitHub API error:', errorData);
                        return false;
                    }
                    //console.log('GitHub API response:', response);
                    //return response.ok;
                } catch (error) {
                    console.error('GitHub API error:', error);
                    return false;
                }
            }
            
            async loadWeekData(week) {
                const token = this.syncSettings.githubToken;
                const owner = this.syncSettings.repoOwner;
                const repo = this.syncSettings.repoName;
                if (!token || !owner || !repo) {
                    console.log('GitHub settings not configured');
                    return null;
                }

                try {
                    const filePath = `data/weeks/${week}.json`;
                    const response = await fetch(
                        `https://api.github.com/repos/${owner}/${repo}/contents/${filePath}`,
                        {
                            headers: {
                                'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}`,
                                'Accept': 'application/vnd.github.raw'
                            }
                        }
                    );

                    if (response.ok) {
                        const data = await response.json();
                        console.log('Successfully loaded from GitHub');
                        return data;
                    } else if (response.status === 404) {
                        console.log('No saved data found for week:', week);
                        return null;
                    } else {
                        throw new Error(`GitHub API error: ${response.status}`);
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    console.log('No saved data found for week:', week);
                    return null;
                }
            }
            
            async exportAsImage() {

                try {

                } catch (error) {

            showSyncStatus(message, type) {

                if (type !== 'loading') {

            showStatusMessage(message, type) {
                // ä¸€æ™‚çš„ãªãƒ¡ãƒƒã‚»ãƒ¼ã‚¸è¡¨ç¤ºï¼ˆToasté¢¨ï¼‰
                const messageDiv = document.createElement('div');

                document.body.appendChild(messageDiv);

            }
